name: Ball Runner (ranknow)
description:
Ball Runner 3D game is an endless game. Just tap on the screen to change the position of the ball and avoid obstacles. The speed of the ball is incredible, and you must have excellent reactions to gain a high score. Can you handle the Ball Runner 3D game? Challenge yourself now!

How to Play Ball Runner?

Tap on the screen to move the Runner ball left and right.

Avoid obstacles.

Collect Gems.

Respawn Runner ball by spending 200 Gems.

Ball Runner 3D game features:

Smooth gameplay.

Modern graphics.

Full free access.

Easy to learn! Too hard to be a pro!

Smooth and simple controls.

It's so fast! Can you handle it?

Challenge yourself now!!!

Music: www.zapsplat.net
